description: SQL/database problem: Find zombie sessions â€” sessions that are still active but have had no recent activity. This is a SQL query problem that identifies stale/zombie sessions from session logs.
constraints: Sessions table with session_id, user_id, start_time, last_activity_time
A zombie session is one where last_activity_time is more than N minutes ago but session is still marked active

starterCode.sql:
SELECT session_id
FROM Sessions
WHERE is_active = 1
  AND last_activity_time < NOW() - INTERVAL N MINUTE
ORDER BY session_id;
